Tumblr Feather Theme

NEW TUMBLR LAYOUT UPDATE!
So Tumblr decided to change their layout. My themes don't look good. For some reasons, some parts of the "blue tumblr" stay visible. I will try to fix that as soon as possible. If you have any question or comment: contact.mariahb@gmail.com or simply the askbox of my blog: mariahb.me.
